post.body: The TwitPic process is a bit tricky to initially set up for your BB, so let me know if you have any questions!
A couple of must-haves: TwitterBerry and TwitPic set up so you can upload photos to Twitter from your phone.
Did you get the Curve? I'm also a recent BlackBerry owner as of Christmas Eve, and I have to say, I'm in love :)
GREAT suggestions; thank you!
A solid bio is key. But the good news is you get 160 characters for that - imagine what you can do with an extra 20!
You're welcome :) And that sounds like a great New Year's resolution!
Thought you should know I've been getting what I assume to be spam DMs from you. I would change your password ASAP!
Snuggies, Billy Mays and the Sham-Wow guy - what a deadly combination.
Short sleeve Snuggies - I love it!
Hahaha, that's hilarious! So does the Snuggie live up to the hype?
NEW puppy photo... woohoo! :D
Two fail whales recently - may be Twitter's way of telling me to go to bed since it is 2:40 a.m. EST. G'night! :)
The Kalamazoo Gazette in Kalamazoo, MI, has recently added an animal blog to its site: http://blog.mlive.com/paws/ - @MLive
RT @jayrosen_nyu This will be a sign to a lot of people. New York Times to Sell Display Ads on the Front Page. http://is.gd/ezPq
RT @ksablan AP says it's encouraging newspapers cooperatives through its content-sharing Member Marketplace http://cli.gs/W94GDG
A friend of mine is looking for advice about creating a quality Twitter bio. Any suggestions?
RT @megwalda For anyone who wants to get serious about their twittering: http://tinyurl.com/5vvd5u
RT @Admore "ESPN360 Billy Mays Office" http://tinyurl.com/7dxzdt - @brianeyster Is that what you're talking about? ;)
All this Snuggies talk between @CharlieCurve @Admore and @kennbell is cracking me up.
Still in a food coma after PizzaPapalis in Troy.
